name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, many netizens’ Twitter accounts have been blocked for unknown reasons. Many people asked me what to do and what happened. Unfortunately, I don’t know.
At present, some netizens have been unblocked through multiple appeals. Perhaps this is the only way to try.
If you have any solutions and suggestions, please add them in the comment section

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Let me add one thing first. When commenting or speaking, everyone must try to be restrained and rational. Do not make overly extreme remarks that hurt or discriminate against others just because of the language habits of the simplified Chinese world. These remarks can easily be reported.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"We were not like this before"
13 years ago, the media during the "7.23" major train rear-end collision accident:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Who says there is no freedom of speech?"
On May 6, Alexander Dugin, a famous Russian political scientist and theorist, opened his personal Weibo and Bilibili accounts.
Dugin is known as "Putin's spiritual mentor". His most famous work in China is the "dismemberment of China" theory he proposed in his book "The Foundations of Geopolitics: Russia's Geopolitical Future".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The suspected murderer's circle of friends circulated on the Internet showed that he was wrongly accused and therefore decided to take revenge on society.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The rescue scene was circulated online

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recent photo of the murderer circulated online

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A senior user's opinion

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the blogger "Zhao Juying Chats about Education" released a series of "home visit" videos. In the videos, the blogger asked the boy to smash his favorite figurines with his own hands, and asked the girl to throw all her toys and comic books into the trash, etc. This series has caused widespread controversy, and a large number of netizens left comments in the comment area, believing that this is "bullying education" and that children's interests and hobbies should not be stifled.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 6, Bazhou, Hebei. Guantang was photographed unfinished, and the owners knelt down and sat in front of the city government to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 6, Yibin, Sichuan. Dingren International Plaza attracted owners to buy shops by offering to return rent, but then defaulted on rent. The owners gathered together to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 6, Qianxi, Hebei. The third phase of Country Garden was left unfinished, and the owner went to the local Housing and Construction Bureau to seek an explanation

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 6, Handan, Hebei. Julei Logistics Company let drivers take out loans to buy cars and then ran away. The drivers who were burdened with debts held banners to protest their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the official account of Guangdong Heyuan Internet Security released a video reminding people to be cautious when speaking online and not to spread rumors.
This caused ridicule from netizens

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 7, Putin was sworn in as the eighth President of the Russian Federation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As Xiangpiaopiao became popular due to the incident of satirizing Japan in its packaging, many domestic brands have expressed their opinions in the comment section or issued announcements, giving thumbs up to Xiangpiaopiao.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Sanfeng Wanhe City in Xingtai City has been unfinished for more than ten years, and now the helpless owners have to live in the unfinished building.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A video showed that another murderer had been arrested by the police earlier.
But at the same time, there was news circulating online that there was only one murderer and the suspect arrested by the police in the green belt was a mistake.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 7, the owners raised the national flag on the unfinished building.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As of today, the harassment against me has also begun to spread to my followers or commenters. Many people will receive a lot of spam private messages, and even have offline chats.
But this did not defeat me. I can still pour back the news you want to block in China one by one. Recall the things you want people to ignore and forget one by one.
This has been the case for more than a year, and it will remain the same in the future.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
@orisatime I am not a hero, I am just a communicator and an ordinary person with a louder voice.
Every individual who is willing to pay attention, continue to ask questions, and dare to spread information in an environment of information blockade is a hero. Because of these people, many things that were originally silent have the opportunity to be paid attention to again.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 7, Guangdong Nanyue Technical School was suspected of withholding wages for workers, causing them to come to the school gate to demand their wages. The school organized instructors and students stationed on campus to confront the workers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
May 6, Xuchang, Henan. Jinke Luming Dijing real estate project was left unfinished, and owners gathered at the gate of Xuchang Municipal Government to defend their rights.
An owner said that the contract promised to deliver the house by the end of September 2022, but it has not been delivered yet. The Xuchang Weidu District Government, banks, Housing and Urban-Rural Development Bureau, officials and businessmen colluded and neglected their duties, forcing the owners to lose their homes and become homeless.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 4 (Release) Changsha, Hunan. Shanda Jinxi crashed, and investors sang "Socialism is Good" to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In addition, you don’t need to think too much about how great I am.
Because in fact, the oppression I have suffered is not the most serious.
There are still many people who insist on doing things to break through the news blockade, and they are doing better than me. So, this is just the largest account for the time being, but it is not the end or the end. …

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 7, Beijing Hemophilia Home issued a statement to the Beijing Municipal Civil Affairs Bureau's Social Organization Office regarding the previous "donation to the People's Republic of China and Beijing for national and urban construction".
It said that the relevant donation content had been deleted as required. It also stated that the donation was a decision made out of the basic awareness of the Chinese people, Communist Party members, and social organization workers. It believed that there was nothing illegal or illegal about its donation behavior.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 7, a Twitter user made "insulting China" and "anti-China" remarks and claimed that he had joined the Shanxi taxation system. As a result, the incident triggered a major investigation of the Shanxi taxation system. The police later reported that the man had been detained.
